synonyms: śrī-keśava—Lord Keśava; padma—lotus; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; gadā—club; dhara—holding; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; śaṅkha—conch; padma—lotus; gadā—club; cakra—disc; dhara—holding.
translation: "Lord Keśava holds the lotus, conch, disc and club. Lord Nārāyaṇa holds the conch, lotus, club and disc.
